text:
Created attachment 32564
Patch for enhancement

Overview:
When using the SOAP/XML-RPC Request sampler, I have to enter the message to send into the data text area. As this message is always XML code, I suggest to format and highlight it.

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Create a new SOAP/XML-RPC Request sampler
2) Enter some XML code into the data text area, e.g. <message>Hello!</message>

Actual Results:
The text is not highlighted

Enhancement:
The text is highlighted and formatted as XML code

Please see the attachment for a patch.

Regards,
loadIT Team

Hello,
Thanks a lot for your contribution.
Unfortunately SOAP/XML-RPC Request sampler should be deprecated soon to encourage using regular HTTP Request (with template Webservice SOAP Test Plan).

If you want to contribute enhancements to other field of JMeter , they are welcome.

Regards
Philippe M.
